des: "I didn't think I liked asparagus until trying this recipe at a Christmas dinner.  Now I cook it for any special occasion and everyone oooh's and aah's when I say it's on the menu."
ins: Heat olive oil and sesame oil in a wok over low to medium heat.  Add ginger, and stir-fry until slightly brown.  Add asparagus, and stir-fry for a few minutes before adding soy sauce and cashews.  Cook until asparagus is tender but still crisp and bright green, stirring frequently.
